values: 团；堆；块；大量；大批；许多；大部分；大多数；一大群；主体；（～es）群众；民众；劳动者阶层；（物体的）质量；（Mass）弥撒；弥撒曲
群众的；民众的；大众的；普通的；大量的；大规模的；整个的；总的
集中；集结；聚集；使成一团；使聚集

synonym.mean: 块，团；群众，民众；大量，众多
群众的，民众的；大规模的，集中的

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 大量的；巨大的，厚重的；魁伟的

word_group.brief_definition: 体质量；体成分；身体质量
公共交通；公共交通工具

bilingual.source: The mass of evidence convinced the jury.
bilingual.target: 大量的证据说服了陪审团。
他们加入了一个新的群众团体。
他加入了一个环保社团。

bilingual.source: She is a member of that art mass organization.
bilingual.target: 她是那个艺术社团的成员。

bilingual.source: This mass organization holds activities every week.
bilingual.target: 这个社团每周都会举行活动。

bilingual.source: Members of the mass organization hold regular meetings.
bilingual.target: 群众团体的成员们定期举行会议。

bilingual.source: Their mass organization is dedicated to community service.
bilingual.target: 他们的社团致力于社区服务。

bilingual.source: There are many different mass organizations in the school.
bilingual.target: 学校有很多不同的社团。

bilingual.source: Mass organization plays an important role in the community.
bilingual.target: 群众团体在社区中发挥着重要作用。

bilingual.source: This mass organization is dedicated to environmental protection.
bilingual.target: 这个群众团体致力于环保事业。

list.abstract: Mass（英 [mas]，美 [mæs]），英语单词，作名词为大多数；质量。作动词为集中，聚集。作形容词为大量的。例句：Five hundred miles west of Iceland, he and his men reached an icy rocky mass of land.（在冰岛以西500英里的地方，他和他的手下到达了一片冰天雪地的陆地。）
MASS指标是所有区间震荡指标中，风险系数最小的一个。由于股价高低点之间的价差波带，忽而宽忽而窄，并且不断的重复循环。梅斯线（MASS）=（最高价-最低价的N1日简单移动平均）/（最高价-最低价的N1日简单移动平均的N1日简单移动平均的N2日累和）。

yingyinNormal.en: Only if you're this jellyfish which periodically reverts to a mass of undifferentiated protoplasm.
yingyinNormal.zh: 除非你是个水母，然后周期性地回复到一大团未分化的原生质。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't know. Could have something to do with mass genocide?
yingyinNormal.zh: 不知道，大概跟种族大屠杀有关吧？

yingyinNormal.en: Electrons move through grapheme, act as if they have no mass.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当电子穿越石墨烯时，所表现出的质量为零。

yingyinNormal.en: If humans say so. You can't just bring weapons of mass destruction into our atmosphere.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是的，如果人类同意的话，你不能把大规模杀伤武器运到我们的地盘。

yingyinNormal.en: Did you know you could calculate the mass of an electron using household items? It's true.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你知道可以用手边的家庭用品计算出电子的质量吗？这是真的哦。

yingyinNormal.en: Sir, FEMA's mission is to prepare for the worst. First responders, medical, mass evacuation.
yingyinNormal.zh: 先生，联邦应急管理局就是为最坏情况做打算。现场急救员，医疗，大量撤离。

yingyinNormal.en: Which, as I understand it, involves the mass genocide of any being you find to be less than superior.
yingyinNormal.zh: 据我说知，你们的事业是要消灭所有比你们低等的生命。

yingyinNormal.en: Which is why I won't condone a mass suicide. If we don't take District 2, we won't get in to the Capitol.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以我才不允许再发动一次自杀式袭击。如果我们不控制住第二区，我们就无法进入国会区。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah. What's, that? That is an integrated ion trap and time-of-flight mass spectrometer. Wow. High-techie-techie.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那个又是什么？那是集成离子阱和飞行时间质谱仪。哇，高科技含量。

yingyinNormal.en: I know. I know, she says it's all mass-produced, nothing is authentic, and everyone winds up having the same stuff.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我也很惊讶，她说那是量产，没有真品，大家买的都一样。

yingyinNormal.en: Using weapons of mass destruction against civilians is a war crime. I appreciate the opportunity to see this through to the end.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对平民使用大规模杀伤性武器是战争罪。我很感激有机会能完成此事。

yingyinNormal.en: Sheldon. Plus, plus, you interact with light, so I can see you. And, also, you don't account for the missing mass in the universe.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢尔顿。还有，还有，你和光相互作用，所以我能看到你。另外，宇宙中那些消失的物质也跟你无关。

yingyinNormal.en: Phoebe hates Pottery Barn? Yeah, she hates all mass produced stuff. She thinks her furniture should have a history, a story behind it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 菲比讨厌陶瓷货仓？量产的东西她都讨厌，她觉得她的家具应该要有历史，有典故。

yingyinNormal.en: The largest mass of ice on Earth, it covers more than 8.5 million square miles and contains around 90 percent of the Earth's fresh water.
yingyinNormal.zh: 南极冰盖是地球上最大的冰，它附盖了超过850平方英里，占了全球百分之九十的淡水资源。

yingyinNormal.en: The same thing I've been doing for three days. Trying to figure out why electrons behave as if they have no mass when traveling through a graphene sheet.
yingyinNormal.zh: 做我这三天一直在做的工作，想要弄明白为什么电子在穿过石墨烯时会表现得像是没有质量一样。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes. It tells us that you participate in the mass cultural delusion that the sun's apparent position relative to arbitrarily defined constellations at the time of your birth, somehow affects your personality.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没错，我们可以了解到，你有群众性文化妄想，就是指你出生时相对于任意确定星座的太阳的视位置，可能会决定你的性格。

yingyinNormal.en: In outer space, you can get so much mass together, like in a super-massive star that the gravity just becomes stronger and stronger and stronger, and eventually the pressure that matter exerts on itself can't keep up.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在外太空，你可以聚起非常多的质量，就像在一个超级巨大的恒星引力就会变得越来越大，越来越大，最终物质对自身施加的压力无法承受。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 大而重的；厚重的；大块的；大量的；大规模的；均匀构造的；严重的；剧烈的；特别成功的；非常有影响的

word_family.mean: n. 团；块；堆；大多数；主要部分；质量；（Mass）弥撒

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 体质量；体成分；身体质量

sense_info_list.en: affecting or involving a large number of people or things

examination_example.sentence: But in what ways is AI changing companies and the larger economy that don't involve doom-and-gloom <highlight>mass</highlight> unemployment predictions?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但人工智能正在哪些方面改变了公司和更大的经济体，而不涉及悲观的大规模失业预测?

examination_example.sentence: "<highlight>Mass</highlight>-produced clothing, like fast food, fills a hunger and need, yet is non-durable and wasteful," Cline argues.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 克莱恩认为:“批量生产的服装，就像快餐一样，满足了人们的需求，但不耐用，也很浪费。”

examination_example.sentence: In the last decade or so, advances in technology have allowed <highlight>mass</highlight>-market labels to react to trends more quickly and anticipate demand more precisely.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在过去十年左右的时间里，技术的进步使得大众品牌能够更快地对潮流做出反应，更准确地预测需求。

sense_info_list.en: the quantity of matter which a body contains

examination_example.sentence: Meanwhile, there are steps you can take to help reduce abdominal fat and maintain lean muscle <highlight>mass</highlight> as you age.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 同时，随着年龄的增长，你可以采取一些措施来帮助减少腹部脂肪，保持精瘦肌肉质量。

examination_example.sentence: It is often defined in terms of body <highlight>mass</highlight> index, or BMI.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它通常用体重指数来定义。

examination_example.sentence: BMI equals body <highlight>mass</highlight> divided by the square of height.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 体重指数等于体重除以身高的平方。

examination_example.sentence: A few wealthy people will own all the capital, and the <highlight>masses</highlight> will struggle in an impoverished wasteland.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 少数富人将拥有全部资本，而群众将在贫困的荒地中挣扎。

examination_example.sentence: And history should be the story of the <highlight>masses</highlight> and their record of struggle.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 历史应该是群众的故事和他们斗争的记录。

sense_info_list.en: a large number of someone or something

examination_example.sentence: The signaling in a plant is more than a <highlight>mass</highlight> of cells that communicate by electricity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 植物中的信号传递不仅仅是通过电进行通信的大量细胞。

examination_example.sentence: Whenever decisions are based on <highlight>masses</highlight> of data, "you quickly get into a lot of ethical questions," notes Tan Kiat How.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Tan Kiat How指出，每当决策建立在大量数据的基础上时，“你很快就会陷入许多伦理问题。”

sense_info_list.en: a large number of them grouped together
assemble or cause to assemble into a mass or as one body

word_usage.usage: in mass的意思是“全体，整个地”，in the mass的意思是“大体而论，概括言之”。
mass有“群众，民众”的意思，有时可与people，public互换

exam_freq_info.chinese: 大量人/物; 大规模的
一团; 一块; 一堆

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 生物量；生物质能燃料
adv. 大量地；沉重地；庄严地
adj. 大而重的；厚重的；大块的；大量的；大规模的；均匀构造的；严重的；剧烈的；特别成功的；非常有影响的

word_family.mean: n. 团；块；堆；大多数；主要部分；质量；（Mass）弥撒

sense_info_list.en: a large number of someone or something
sense_info_list.zh: 大量人/物; 大规模的

examination_example.sentence: These decades saw a climb in general standards of living and avoidance of <highlight>mass</highlight> societal traumas like full-scale war or economic deprivation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这几十年来，人们的生活水平普遍提高，并且避免了大规模社会创伤，例如全面战争或经济匮乏。

examination_example.sentence: This is the story of wildlife conservation in the age of <highlight>mass</highlight> extinction.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是一个关于大规模灭绝时代野生动物保护的故事。

examination_example.sentence: They are likely to remain rich people's playthings rather than practical transport solutions for the <highlight>masses</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们很可能仍是富人的玩物，而不是大众实用的交通工具。

examination_example.sentence: The founder of two tech companies, Tesla Motors and SpaceX, is bringing electric vehicles to <highlight>mass</highlight> market and enabling humans to live on other planets.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 作为特斯拉汽车 (Tesla Motors) 和 SpaceX 两家科技公司的创始人，他正在将电动汽车推向大众市场，并使人类能够在其他星球上生活。

examination_example.sentence: They were the pioneers of gender equity, in their useful, adaptable clothing, which was both made for the <highlight>masses</highlight> and capable of self-expression.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们是性别平等的先驱，他们有用的，适应性强的服装既适合大众，又具有自我表达能力。

sense_info_list.en: a large number of them grouped together
sense_info_list.zh: 一团; 一块; 一堆

sense_info_list.en: the quantity of matter which a body contains

exam_freq_info.chinese: 大量人/物; 大规模的
一团; 一块; 一堆

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

examination_example.sentence: Researchers have shown that body <highlight>mass</highlight> index is related to wages and income.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究表明，身体质量指数与工资和收入有关。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 大而重的；厚重的；大块的；大量的；大规模的；均匀构造的；严重的；剧烈的；特别成功的；非常有影响的

word_family.mean: n. 团；块；堆；大多数；主要部分；质量；（Mass）弥撒

examination_example.sentence: In addition, most newspapers had little in them that would appeal to a <highlight>mass</highlight> audience.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 此外，大多数报纸几乎没有吸引大众的内容。

sense_info_list.en: a large number of someone or something

examination_example.sentence: Some people may think that a garden is no more than plants, flowers, patterns and <highlight>masses</highlight> of color.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有些人可能认为花园只不过是植物、花朵、图案和大量的颜色。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 大而重的；厚重的；大块的；大量的；大规模的；均匀构造的；严重的；剧烈的；特别成功的；非常有影响的

word_family.mean: n. 团；块；堆；大多数；主要部分；质量；（Mass）弥撒

examination_example.sentence: Mark Twain, who was to make a speech at the <highlight>mass</highlight> meeting of the Independents last night, didn't come to time!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 马克·吐温打算在昨晚的独立派集会上发表演讲，但他没来。

sense_info_list.en: a large number of someone or something

examination_example.sentence: The number of <highlight>mass</highlight> shooting in the US has quickly increased in recent years.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 近年来，美国大规模枪击事件的数量迅速增加。
